Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! Hey there, <MYNAME>. What'cha doing
here?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ha ha! You don't have to answer. I already know!
<PAGE>
It's obvious you've come to ferret out the secret
to farming success from your greatest rival--me!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I really should keep my secrets to myself, but I
can see on your face how much you wanna
know, so I gueeeeeess I could show you.
<PAGE>
So c'mon, follow me! ♪ You came at just the
right time to observe my special watering
techniques!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
C'mon, what're you waiting for? Follow me!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I'm gonna demonstrate first, so just watch
for a second. First, I equip my watering can...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Then, I face the field I want to water
aaaaand...water awaaay!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
See? Like that. Okay, <MYNAME>, give it a
whirl.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong? Was there something you didn't
understand? Whenever you're ready, just give it a
shot.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa, not bad! Heh heh, it's good to have a
disciple who's a quick learner! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But to be honest, your form's a bit stiff. Why
don't you practice on some other fields?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah, there you go! Goin' with the flow; I like it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, right! If you run out of water, just get some
more from the well fountain.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow. I guess you wound up doing all my
watering for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But all that practice has allowed you to perfect
the secret watering technique passed down by
the old masters!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now that you've learned that, you're gonna be an
even bigger rival than before...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY><WINDOW_FLAME_R>But I ain't gonna lose to you that easily! I'm
gonna be the greatest farmer in this whole town!
No...
<PAGE>
<FONT_SIZE_L>IN THE WORLD!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyways, I'd better get back to work. See ya
round, <MYNAME>!
